The top section contains Google search and assistant widgets, followed by apps like Chrome, Settings, Calendar, and Gmail. Below that, various other apps are displayed, including Contacts, Drive, Files, Camera, and Maps. The bottom row features system apps like the dialer and Google Play Store.
